name: ZOO
overview: In Zoo, the player takes the role of a local employee of the animal welfare organisation HAED (Hulp Aan Eenzame Dieren), who has heard from a reliable source that something strange is going on at the local zoo. The zoo management is secretly buying new animals, and nobody seems to know what happened to the old animals. After gather enough evidence through talking to people and finding clues, the player can then arrest the right culprit with an arrest warrant. This graphical adventure game in Dutch can be played by keyboard, joystick and supports mouse control.
